item.title: New site!
item.description: Here i am, new beautifull clean static site I needed a new site, both for my works and for my personal world and a static one was the best option i can think of. Time will tell me. Benvenuti!

item.title: About
item.description: Undergraduate student at UniMI - Network and System security. High school diploma in Information Technology - Telecommunication Specialization. In my free time i love modify everything that has a PCB, admire old classic cars and ride my mtb in the wild. For detailed CV, job proposals or any other inquiries feel free to email me at fumagalli.matteo@posteo.net

item.title: Home
item.description: Hi! I’m Matt, an italian cybersecurity student, junior sysadmin and all-round tech nerd. I dig mainly web and networking stuff. Here some of my scattered thoughts and works:
